title: 'Siruca Pictograms' become an open source font
content:
Hi friends and colleagues

I’d love to design a lot of new picts for my 'Siruca Pictograms' but I can’t find the time, so I decided to distribute it as Open Source.  
Could you help me to grow the number of picts?

[http://www.fsd.it/sirucapictograms](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416233036/http:/www.fsd.it/sirucapictograms "http://www.fsd.it/sirucapictograms")

Thanks in advance!  
Fabrizio
author: fsd

comments.content:
I have not yet found a quiet moment, Fabrizio, but I promise I will think about adding some…

P.S. Maybe it would be of help to post Siruca's conception (and its connection to the hotel project in the Emirates), so people will be able to get the feeling of the segnaletic icons…

O-zone added 76 new symbols to Siruca Pictograms™  
This my Open Source project taked off!

The invitation is still active for you all.  
Above all for you Claudio…
